ai-atk-s0510a21:0_0: Taking a flower from an old cloth,
ai-atk-s0510a21:2_0: (and all) from here and therefore we will perform (them).
ai-atk-s0510a21:2_1: twenty-four years, twenty-four, thirty, forty-four years (afterwards), all of them declared their enlightenment, and twenty-four noble truths. They declare of their enlightenment, bases of fact that they have gained diverse doctrines, and all the eighteen sections on the Sambuddhas.
ai-atk-s0510a21:2_2: Good people don’t indulge in hand, which is empty of things -
